Calculator

Thank you for expressing interest in Copler Team Calculator.
The purpose of this calculator is to help you to determine
a service cost you may expect while partnering with Copler.

Partnering with a technical support outsourcing provider is a big decision. Each front line interaction is an opportunity to increase revenue, improve retention and to boost overall profitability. As a result, you must understand all the benefits you could get with a partner
like Copler.

The Team calculator is a first step to understand a Ukrainian market, choose location, team and service and to forecast how much of cost saving or revenue gain you may expect
working with Copler.
